subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Southern Methodist junior Bryson DeChambeau birdied the final hole to give the United States a two-stroke victory over Canada in the world amateur team championship in Karuizawa, Japan.
snippet: The Southern Methodist junior Bryson DeChambeau birdied the final hole to give the United States a two-stroke victory over Canada in the world amateur team championship in Karuizawa, Japan.
